Alex: A number of goods -- about 10 items total -- have been stolen from Warehouse Keeper Sonin's warehouse. During my investigation, I narrowed the list of suspects down to 5 creatures: Delu Lizardman Suppliers, Special Agents, Commanders, Shaman and Cursed Seers. Find the thief, recover the 10 Stolen Cargo items and return them to Sonin. Then I am sure he will, in gratitude, provide you with the letter of reference.
